column1: Caluquembe (Kalukembe) is a town and municipality
column5: Angola.It is also the site of two missionary efforts; one
column7: Evangelical Protestant. At the Protestant mission there were for the majority of the past century a Bible school and a hospital run by the Swiss Alliance Missionaire Evangelique.

column1: Caluquembe has a subtropical highland climate (Köppen: Cwb).
